definitions.definition: The place in a home where a fire is or was traditionally kept for home heating and for cooking , usually constituted by at least a hearthstone and often enclosed to varying degrees by any combination of reredos , fireplace , oven , smoke hood , or chimney .
A hearthstone , either as standalone or as the floor of an enclosed fireplace or oven .
A fireplace : an open recess in a wall at the base of a chimney where a fire may be built .
The lowest part of a metallurgical furnace .
A brazier , chafing dish , or firebox .
A household or group in some forms of the modern pagan faith Heathenry .

main_definition: The place in a home where a fire is or was traditionally kept for home heating and for cooking , usually constituted by at least a hearthstone and often enclosed to varying degrees by any combination of reredos , fireplace , oven , smoke hood , or chimney .
secondary_definitions: A hearthstone , either as standalone or as the floor of an enclosed fireplace or oven .
A fireplace : an open recess in a wall at the base of a chimney where a fire may be built .
The lowest part of a metallurgical furnace .
A brazier , chafing dish , or firebox .
( Germanic paganism ) A household or group in some forms of the modern pagan faith Heathenry .
